request.lesson_description: The structure and function of cell organelles, including the nucleus, mitochondria, ribosomes, endoplasmic reticulum, and more.
request.additional_guidance: Focus on key organelles and their roles in maintaining cellular function. Include real-world examples such as how mitochondria are the 'powerhouses' of the cell and their importance in energy production.
